catalog_info.title: Chinese in Social Sciences
catalog_info.notes: Students are required to attend the lectures of Chinese History 113. Most readings in Chinese. Discussions in Chinese. Counts toward Language Citation in Modern Chinese.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Grade of B or better in Chinese 140b or equivalent proficiency.
catalog_info.description: Advanced language practice associated with authentic academic texts in social science disciplines (e.g., history, politics, sociology, economics).
